name: IG Posts Carousel
author: iografica

sections.description:
IG Posts Carousel is an easy to use posts and products carousel for WordPress. IG Posts Carousel displays posts, WooCommerce Products and Easy Digital Downloads Products as carousel using shortcodes and widgets. The plugin has plenty of user-friendly options to configure the slider easily.

IG Posts Carousel features:

  • Posts carousel.
  • WooCommerce products carousel.
  • Easy Digital Download products carousel.
  • Products and posts can be filtered by categories.
  • Carousel shortcode and carousel widget included.
  • Easy to customize with shortcode attributes and widget settings.

Documentation

  • Documentation – Read the plugin documentation.

Any idea or suggestion?

  • Submit your idea – Send us your feedback and suggestions.

IG Posts Carousel Premium:

With the IG Posts Carousel Premium extension you can:

  • Change colors.
  • Change layout.
  • Custom fonts.
  • Custom CSS code.
  • Priority support.

Read more about this extension – IG Posts Carousel Customizer
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Unzip the folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Tested support for WordPress 4.6

1.2

  • Added more clean style to the slider.
  • Fixed admin Getting Started section.

1.3

  • Added analytics opt-in.

1.4

  • Tested with WordPress 4.7.

1.5

  • Fixed welcome page.

1.6

  • Fixed settings page.

1.7

  • Fixed shortcode error with edd products.

short_description: Easily add a responsive carousel of recent posts and products to WordPress.
